content:
I’m a research fellow in Monash University working with Dinh Phung. I’m interested in statistical machine learning, e.g., Bayesian modelling and inference; deep learning, e.g., deep generative models; and robust machine learning, e.g., robustness of deep learning models.
I obtained my PhD at Monash University in 2019. During my PhD, I’ve been fortunately collaborating with several brilliant researchers including Wray Buntine, Lan Du, Mingyuan Zhou, Piyush Rai.

title: He Zhao
